WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS 14 THRU 21 JUL BY
   M/V OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 12 9260 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-59S 038-15W, 22-19S 038-15W,
   22-19S 039-44W, 22-00S 039-44W,
   21-59S 039-40W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 22 JUL 18.
